featured.text: I was worried about my first overseas trip, but my father ______ me that he would help plan the trip so that nothing would go wrong.
It is both legally and _______ wrong to spread rumors about other people on the Internet.
They have set up “listening clinics” and courses to find out what is wrong—and what to do about it. 31.
That being said, I’m definitely a carnivore and prefer meat, but I don’t see anything wrong with choosing one of the fakey- fakey meaty things once in a while—just for a change.

other.text: Traditionally, shame poles were carved for a chief to embarrass and ridicule another who had done something wrong.
To teach children right from wrong, some parents will ______
Once the wrong was made right, the pole was taken down.

definition.example: I realized I had the wrong answer on the test.
